DOC.brief_summary: Comparison between retinal measurements, done by the RT (Retinal Thickness) imaging and a commercial OCT (Optical Coherence Tomography)
DOC.brief_title: Macular Thickness Measurements Using Retinal-thickness OCT
DOC.criteria: 1. Ability and agreement to give informed consent (IC) 2. Diagnosis of AMD or DR in SE by OCT 3. Ability to undergo OCT scans 1. AMD and DR in the same SE 2. Evidence of macular disease other than AMD or DME in SE
